.load core/testdata/family_rules.dl
----
application/datalog

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
mother: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}+1]
22: [{C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}+1]
27: [{C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}+1]
37: [{B: "Pete", C: "Mary"}+1]
24: []

38: []
29: [{C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}+1]
parent: [parent{child: "Pete", parent: "Mary"}+1]
10: [{C: "Pete", P: "Mary"}+1]
18: [{A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}+1]
30: [{L: "Pete", P1: "Mary"}+1]
33: [{P2: "Mary", R: "Pete"}+1]
36: [{A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}+1]
41: [{X: "Pete", Z: "Mary"}+1]
42: [{X: "Pete", Y: "Mary"}+1]
46: [{A: "Pete", B: "Mary"}+1]

44: []

ancestor{}?

application/datalog
ancestor{an: "Mary", desc: "Pete"}.

-mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
